gettingStarted.title: 🌱 Getting Started
gettingStarted.description: FazendaRPG is a farm simulation game inspired by RuneScape and FarmRPG. Build your farm, grow crops, level up and become the best farmer!
gettingStarted.menuNavDesc: Click the 3-line button (☰) in the top right corner to open the menu
gettingStarted.clickInteractionDesc: Click on farm plots, inventory items, NPCs and other elements to interact
gettingStarted.mobileFriendlyDesc: The game works perfectly on mobile! Tap the screen to interact
gettingStarted.installAppDesc: In your browser, use "Add to home screen" to install as PWA
gettingStarted.firstFarmDesc: You start with a small farm of 9 plots where you can plant crops. Here's how to start:
gettingStarted.step1Desc: Use the side menu (☰) and click on Inventory. You start with:
gettingStarted.step2Desc: Go back to the Farm (side menu) and click on an empty plot (brown square)
gettingStarted.step2Desc2: Select Wheat and confirm. You'll spend 2 energy ⚡
gettingStarted.step3Desc: Wheat takes 30 seconds to grow. You'll see the stages:
gettingStarted.step3Desc2: Tip: Use fertilizer to reduce time by 50% (15 seconds)!
gettingStarted.step4Desc: When the wheat is ready (🌾), click on the plot and select Harvest
gettingStarted.step5Desc: Go to the Market (side menu) and sell your wheat for 5 gold
gettingStarted.step5Desc2: Use the gold to buy more seeds and expand your farm!
gettingStarted.energyTip: 💡 Tip: Rest at the Tavern to recover energy faster!
gettingStarted.progressionItem1: Level Up: Gain XP by planting, harvesting and selling
gettingStarted.progressionItem2: Unlock Crops: New crops become available at higher levels
gettingStarted.progressionItem3: Earn Gold: Sell your products and accumulate wealth
gettingStarted.nextStepsDesc: Now that you know the basics, explore:
gettingStarted.nextStepsItem1: 🌾 Crops Guide: Learn about all available crops
gettingStarted.nextStepsItem2: ⚙️ How to Play: Understand all game mechanics
gettingStarted.nextStepsItem3: 👥 NPCs: Meet the characters and their quests

gameMechanics.title: ⚙️ How to Play
gameMechanics.mainMechanicsDesc: FazendaRPG combines farming, RPG and skill progression elements. Here's everything you need to know:
gameMechanics.farmingDesc: The heart of the game is the cultivation system:
gameMechanics.farmingItem1: Farm Plots: You start with 9 empty plots
gameMechanics.farmingItem2: Plant: Click on an empty plot and select a seed
gameMechanics.farmingItem3: Growth: Each crop has a specific growth time
gameMechanics.farmingItem4: Harvest: When ready, click and harvest to receive the item + XP
gameMechanics.farmingItem6: Weeds: Appear randomly and must be cleared
gameMechanics.energyRegenItem4: Meals: Buy food at the Tavern to recover energy
gameMechanics.skillsDesc: The game has a robust skill system:
gameMechanics.xpItem1: Each action gives XP in the corresponding skill
gameMechanics.xpItem2: Required XP increases with each level
gameMechanics.inventoryItem3: Sorting: Sort by name, quantity or value
gameMechanics.marketTab1: Buy Tab: Purchase seeds, tools and materials
gameMechanics.marketTab2: Sell Tab: Sell your crops and items for gold
gameMechanics.marketFeature2: Prices: Each item has a buy and sell value
gameMechanics.marketFeature3: Sell All: Sell multiple items at once
gameMechanics.npcFeature1: Dialogues: Talk to NPCs to learn about the world
gameMechanics.npcFeature4: Gifts: Give items to increase friendship (coming soon)
gameMechanics.tip1: 🌱 Plant fast crops (wheat) to level up quickly at the start
gameMechanics.tip2: 💰 Sell your crops regularly to accumulate gold
gameMechanics.tip3: 🌿 Use fertilizers on slow crops to save time
gameMechanics.tip4: ⚡ Manage your energy! Don't spend it all at once
gameMechanics.tip5: 🧹 Clear weeds as soon as they appear
gameMechanics.tip6: 📊 Focus on one skill at a time for more efficient progression
gameMechanics.tip8: 💾 The game auto-saves, but you can make manual backups

cropsGuide.title: 🌾 Crops Guide
cropsGuide.allCropsDesc: Available crops organized by level and growth time. Use fertilizer to reduce time by 50%!
cropsGuide.farmingTipDesc: Fertilizers are your best friend! They reduce growth time by half. Use on crops 90s+ for maximum efficiency!
cropsGuide.efficiencyDesc: See which crops give the most XP and Gold per second:
cropsGuide.growthStagesDesc: All crops go through 3 visual stages:
cropsGuide.growthStagesNote: You can only harvest when the crop is at the final stage (mature)!
cropsGuide.tip1: You need the Hand Trowel in your inventory to plant
cropsGuide.tip2: Fertilizer reduces 50% of time - use on slow crops!
cropsGuide.tip3: Weeds appear after harvesting - clear them to get 1x Herbs 🌿
cropsGuide.tip4: Plant multiple plots at once to maximize efficiency
cropsGuide.tip5: Higher level crops give more XP and gold, but take longer

toolsGuide.title: 🔧 Tools Guide
toolsGuide.essentialDesc: These tools are required to perform actions on the farm. Always keep them in your inventory!
toolsGuide.trowelUse: Required to plant seeds in empty plots
toolsGuide.trowelGet: You start with 1x in your initial inventory
toolsGuide.hoeGet: You start with 1x in your initial inventory
toolsGuide.rakeGet: You start with 1x in your initial inventory
toolsGuide.durabilityDesc: Currently, tools don't break and have unlimited uses. Keep them in your inventory at all times!
toolsGuide.tip1: Never sell your tools! You need them for practically everything
toolsGuide.tip2: If you accidentally sold them, buy them back at the Market
toolsGuide.tip3: Hoe and Rake do the same thing - you only need one
toolsGuide.tip4: The Trowel is the most important tool - without it you can't plant!
toolsGuide.futureToolsDesc: In future updates, more tools will be added:

fertilizerGuide.title: 🌿 Fertilizer Guide
fertilizerGuide.whatIsDesc: Fertilizer is a special item that reduces crop growth time by 50%. It's essential for efficient farming!
fertilizerGuide.howWorksDesc: Fertilizer must be applied BEFORE planting the seed:
fertilizerGuide.step4: The crop will grow in 50% of normal time!
fertilizerGuide.use2: High level crops - More XP and gold per hour
fertilizerGuide.use3: Intensive farming - When you want to farm quickly
fertilizerGuide.dontUse2: Low level crops - Save for the good ones
fertilizerGuide.efficiencyDesc: Best crops to use fertilizer on:
fertilizerGuide.tip1: Buy fertilizers when you have spare gold - They're an investment!
fertilizerGuide.tip2: Use on overnight crops - Plant before sleeping
fertilizerGuide.tip3: Combine with multiple plots - Fertilize 9 plots at once
fertilizerGuide.tip4: Fertilizer is consumed on use - plan carefully!

skillsSystem.title: 📊 Skills System
skillsSystem.uniqueSkillsDesc: FazendaRPG has 8 different skills, each with its own level (maximum 99) and unique actions!
skillsSystem.independentDesc: You have a separate level for each skill. Farming lvl 10 doesn't affect Mining!
skillsSystem.gainXPDesc: Plant to gain Farming XP, fish for Fishing XP, etc.
skillsSystem.unlockActionsDesc: Higher levels unlock better actions with more XP and rewards!
skillsSystem.tip1: Focus on one skill at a time to progress faster
skillsSystem.tip2: High level skills give more XP per action

leveling.title: 🎯 Levels and XP
leveling.howLevelingDesc: FazendaRPG uses a progressive XP system. Each level requires more XP than the previous one!
leveling.playerLevelDesc: Your main level is the sum of all skill levels divided by 8.
leveling.skillLevelsDesc: Each skill has its own independent level (maximum 99).
leveling.totalXPDesc: To reach max level in a skill, you need approximately 485,100 XP!
leveling.bonusesDesc: Every 10 levels you receive special bonuses:

npcsGuide.title: 👥 NPCs Guide
npcsGuide.meetNPCsDesc: FazendaRPG has several unique NPCs, each with personality, quests and special items!
npcsGuide.talk: Talk: Learn about the NPC and receive tips
npcsGuide.quest: Quests: Accept challenges and earn rewards
npcsGuide.friendshipDesc: Build relationships with NPCs through interactions and gifts!

questsGuide.title: 📜 Quest System
questsGuide.questTypesDesc: There are different types of quests with varying rewards:
questsGuide.storyDesc: Main quests that advance the game's narrative
questsGuide.dailyDesc: Repeat every 24h - great for farming resources
questsGuide.step1: Talk to NPCs to receive quests
questsGuide.step3: Return to the NPC to claim rewards
questsGuide.trackingDesc: See your active quests in the Quests tab:

itemsGuide.title: 📦 Items Guide
itemsGuide.seedsDesc: Plant to grow on the farm
itemsGuide.stackingDesc: Most items stack up to 999. Tools don't stack.
itemsGuide.sellingDesc: Sell items at the Market for gold. Sell price is 50% of buy price.

tipsGuide.title: 💎 Tips and Tricks
tipsGuide.tip1: Always keep the 3 basic tools in inventory
tipsGuide.tip2: Plant Wheat early to level up fast
tipsGuide.tip4: Visit the Tavern when energy runs out
tipsGuide.tip7: Focus on one skill at a time

strategiesGuide.title: 🎯 Advanced Strategies
strategiesGuide.strategy2: Time Optimization: Use crops that grow while you're offline
strategiesGuide.method2: Fishing: Rare fish are worth a lot
strategiesGuide.method4: Events: Event items sell for high prices
strategiesGuide.xpMethod2: High XP/s: Calculate and use the best
strategiesGuide.mistake3: Letting energy stay full without using it

faqGuide.title: ❓ Frequently Asked Questions
faqGuide.q1: How do I save my progress?
faqGuide.a1: The game auto-saves. You can also make manual backups in Settings.
faqGuide.a2: Yes! FazendaRPG is a PWA and works completely offline after first load.
faqGuide.a3: Yes! The game is fully responsive and can be installed as an app on mobile.
faqGuide.a4: You need the Hand Trowel in inventory. Click an empty plot and select the seed.
faqGuide.a5: They appear after harvesting. Clear them to get 1x Herbs. Use Hoe or Rake.
faqGuide.a6: No. The effect lasts only for that planting. After harvest, you need to apply again.
faqGuide.q7: How do I get more energy?
faqGuide.a7: Energy regenerates naturally (1 every 2min), level up, or rest at the Tavern.
faqGuide.q8: Can I transfer saves between devices?
faqGuide.a8: Yes! Use 'Save Game' to download, and 'Load Game' on the other device.
faqGuide.a9: No! FazendaRPG is 100% free without paywall or ads.
faqGuide.a10: Contact the developer through GitHub or Discord.
faqGuide.a11: Yes! The game is in active development with regular updates.
faqGuide.a12: These skills are planned for future updates. Stay tuned to the changelog!

updatesGuide.title: 📰 Game Updates
updatesGuide.upcoming1: ⛏️ Mining System - Mine stones and ores
updatesGuide.changelogDesc: To see all detailed changes, check the CHANGELOG.md file in the repository.

farm.title: Your Farm
farm.needTrowel: You need a Hand Trowel to plant seeds!
farm.needWeedTool: You need a Hoe or Rake to clear weeds!
farm.weedsGrown: Weeds have grown on the plot
farm.allPlotsHaveWeeds: All empty plots have weeds! Clear them before planting.
farm.someHaveWeeds: plot(s) with weeds will be ignored.
farm.noEmptyPlotsAvailable: No empty plots available to plant

farming.name: Farming
farming.description: Plant and harvest crops to gain farming experience.

mining.name: Mining
mining.description: Mine stones and precious ores from the depths of the earth.

fishing.name: Fishing
fishing.description: Catch various types of fish in rivers and lakes.

woodcutting.name: Woodcutting
woodcutting.description: Chop trees to obtain wood and logs.

foraging.name: Foraging
foraging.description: Gather herbs, fruits and wild resources.

market.noItems: No items available in this category
market.noSellItems: You don't have items to sell in this category

settings.notificationsDesc: Get notified when your crops are ready to harvest
settings.notificationsNotSupported: ⚠️ Notifications not supported in this browser

settings.confirmLoadFile:

Tip: Save your current progress first to avoid losing it.

errors.notEnoughGoldForStory: You need {cost} gold to hear stories
errors.minDepositRequired: You need at least {min} gold to deposit
errors.fertilizeAlreadyDesc: This crop is already growing faster!
errors.confirmDestroy: Are you sure you want to destroy this crop?
errors.confirmDestroyDesc: This action cannot be undone and you will receive nothing back.
